info.author: Ransom
info.description: Team Game - Drugs are being smuggled into USA by a large drug syndicate using small commerical airplanes and a rural desert airport in the US. The US military has caught on to their operations. They have sent military jets with orders to use lethal force to prevent anymore drugs from reaching US soil. Drug runners win if one airplane sucessfully reaches the airport. US military wins if all drug planes are destroyed.
